nodes.text: The mother of the girl Nette was a female individual who owned an apartment on the Gavana Orbital space station. One day, her daughter and fellow Gavana Orbital resident Yrica Quell watched a holovid of the fugitive Senator Mon Mothma making a plea for rebellion against the Galactic Empire in the apartment. Nette eventually left the space station to join the Alliance.
Nette's mother was mentioned in the 2019 novel Alphabet Squadron, written by Alexander Freed.
